settings.title: This is the beard roller
settings.text:
The Grooming Lab Beard Roller is made of a firm grip handle alongside a head containing 540 titanium needles of about 0.5mm in width.

Our Beard Roller helps penetrate the top layer of the skin and creates thousands of microscopic channels, activating new follicles and tissue, and utlizing the body's natural healing process.

settings.code:
It is now possible to stimulate hair growth!

Stimulate hair growth! The Beard Roller creates 'micro-injuries' to the skin and activates the dormant hair follicles. This procedure allows your skin to more effectively absorb The Activator Serum and boost your beard to its full potential! Note: Combine with the Activator Serum for best results.
See the Beard and Grooming Kit

Growth Guarentee

The team at The Grooming Lab Co have great confidence in the Beard Growth Kit. Enough confidence to offer you a Growth Guarantee.

Yep, if you don’t get any results you get your money back.

Step 1: Use the Beard Growth Kit for at least 150 days
Step 2: Make sure to document your progress with monthly pictures
Step 3: No results? Get in contact with us as soon as possible.
Step 4: Return your products and receive your refund immediately.

Clinical Studies on the Beard Roller

Hairs are getting thicker
(Improved hair thickness (average 10%))
New hairs are noticeable (94% of men activated new facial hairs)
Hairs grows faster and denser (Improved beard density (average 55%))

Step By Step Guide

— Use The Beard Roller twice a week — Clean The Beard Roller — Roll with a light pressure 10 times back and forth - horizontally, vertically and diagonally
Note: There is no need to use The Beard Roller more than twice a week. The skin needs time between use to regenerate. Don't use The Beard Roller on irritated or infected skin. It should never be painful to use.
The Beard Roller is personal and should never be shared. The lifetime of The Beard Roller is not infinite (around 6 months). When the needles are no longer sharp enough to penetrate the skin easily, it's time for a replacement. We recommend pairing the beard roller with the beard kit for optimal results.
Learn about the Beard Kit

Growth Progress

Slide to see the progress

Meet Mark. We asked him to take a before picture prior to using The Grooming Lab Beard kit and a picture after. We will let the results speak for themselves.

Growth Guarentee

The team at The Grooming Lab Co have great confidence in the Beard Growth Kit. Enough confidence to offer you a Growth Guarantee.

Yep, if you don’t get any results you get your money back.

Step 1: Use the Beard Growth Kit for at least 150 days
Step 2: Make sure to document your progress with monthly pictures
Step 3: No results? Get in contact with us as soon as possible.
Step 4: Return your products and receive your refund immediately.

Proven Results

We have great confidence in our Beard Growth Kit. Enough confidence to offer you a Growth Guarantee.

Of all of our beard kit testers, 87% reported the following results:

Hairs are getting thicker
(Improved hair thickness (average 10%))
New hairs are noticeable (94% of men activated new facial hairs)
Hairs grows faster and denser (Improved beard density (average 55%))

What's inside the Grooming Lab beard kit?

Beard Oil

Activates your facial hairs and boosts your beard growth

Beard Roller

Maximizes serum absorption and stimulates the sleeping follicles

Beard Wash

Cleanse the beard and skin thoroughly without stripping it of its natural oils

Beard Oil

Hairs grows faster and denser (Improved beard density (average 55%))

The Beard Roller

The 540 titanium needles create microscopic channels and activate the body’s natural healing process. The Beard Roller increases blood circulation, stimulates sleeping follicles, and maximizes serum absorption. increases blood circulation, stimulates sleeping follicles, and maximizes serum absorption.

The Beard Oil

Crafted to help with beard management by smoothing and conditioning the hair and moisturising the underlying skin. Fast-absorbing, lightweight and non-greasy oil.

The Beard Balm

The beard balm works as a leave-in conditioner which will moisturize, condition, style and soften your beard. It contains moisturizing shea butter, sunflower oil to help condition and boost growth and beeswax which helps seal in moisture. All of these ingredients are combined to help promote proper beard growth and keep your beard healthy and smelling its best.

settings.title: International/Domestic Shipping policy
settings.text:
• Free Standard Delivery over $20 ($4.99 for orders under)
• $5.00 EXPRESS Delivery
• FREE Western Sydney PickUps

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We currently offer standard and express shipping worldwide on all orders.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text: With the current Coronavirus situation, your delivery may take anywhere between 5 days – 3 weeks depending on location. However, we do our best to get your order to you as fast as we can.

settings.title: Returns and exchanges
settings.text: We offer free returns on all orders within 30 days of delivery, provided the item and its packaging are in good condition. In the unlikely event that you have received a faulty product, we are able to provide either an exchange or a full refund of the purchase price. If you would like to make a return, please get in contact with our friendly staff by emailing us at support@thegroominglab.co, or through our contact form.

settings.title: CAN I RETURN AN ITEM?
settings.text:
Unopened Products
Changed your mind? No problem! We will happily accept returns of UNUSED and UNOPENED products. Please note that we do not refund the original postage fees with the return. To return a product, please contact our customer service team with your order number and the item's details.

Damaged or Faulty Products
We take great care when packing your items so that they won't get damaged in transit. If an item does arrive damaged, we ask that you let us know right away and we'll arrange for the item to be returned back to us and a replacement to be sent out to you. Or if you prefer, we can refund you the original purchase price if the product is deemed faulty (less any postage costs).

settings.title: HOW LONG DO I HAVE TO RETURN MY PRODUCTS?
settings.text:
For change of mind on UNUSED and UNOPENED products, you may return the product up until 365 days from the order date. Please note that the unwanted item/s must be returned back to us in their original condition. Please read the returns process below.

For faulty products, please contact us here to confirm the warranty period and steps for your return.

settings.title: HOW DO I RETURN MY ITEMS?
settings.text:
1. Contact our customer service team and let us know that you would like to arrange a product return. We'll advise the best address for you to send the item back to.

2. Pack and seal the item/s in their original shipping package and post them back to us.

3. Provided that we receive the products in their original UNUSED and UNOPENED condition, we will arrange for the original purchase price (not including original postage fees) to be refunded to the purchaser's credit card or PayPal account. Please allow up to 7 days from the date we receive the returned goods for the refund to be processed.

settings.title: order information
settings.text: For any inquiries regarding an order you have placed, or for an order that you believe should've arrived, please view the questions below, or email the team at support@thegroominglab.co for help.

settings.title: CAN I CHANGE OR CANCEL AN ORDER AFTER I'VE PLACED IT?
settings.text: Our warehouse team prepares and dispatches orders very quickly to meet our shipping cut-off times. However, if you need to change or cancel your order, please contact our customer service team with your order number and we will accommodate as quickly as possible. Typically, orders placed before 3pm can be changed before 3pm the same day. Orders placed after 3pm can be changed until 10AM the following business day.

settings.title: I'M MISSING AN ITEM FROM MY ORDER, WHAT DO I DO?
settings.text: We take great care when packing your items but things may go awry from time to time. If your order is missing an item, please contact our customer service team with your order number and the missing item's name. We will resolve the issue for you as quickly as possible.

settings.title: I HAVE THE WRONG ITEM OR A FAULTY ITEM IN MY ORDER, WHAT DO I DO?
settings.text: If you have received an incorrect or faulty product, please contact our customer service team with your order number and the details of what went wrong. We will resolve the issue for you as quickly as possible.

settings.title: HOW CAN I PAY FOR MY ORDER?
settings.text: You can pay for your order using Visa, MasterCard, and American Express debit and credit cards, as well as PayPal and Afterpay. If you are trying to use a discount code, please enter it into the Discount field on the Checkout page, and press 'Apply'.

settings.title: WHEN WILL I BE CHARGED FOR MY ORDER?
settings.text: If your card is authorised, payment will immediately be taken from your account and you will receive an order confirmation email. If your card is not authorised, payment will not be taken.

settings.title: IS THERE A MINIMUM SPEND FOR AFTERPAY?
settings.text: Yes, we have a minimum spend of $40 for any order using Afterpay.

settings.title: ARE MY DETAILS SAFE WHEN ORDERING WITH THE GROOMING LAB CO©?
settings.text: Yes! Our site is built upon the secure Shopify platform that offers best-in-class security that is regularly updated to counter any new online threats. We do not store any credit card details on our site, so your information is always secure.

settings.code:
Are you a customer who needs help? That's what the team at The Grooming Lab Co are here for.

If you're wondering about an order, our products, or our website, shoot an email directly at support@thegroominglab.co through the fields below, or check out the Help & FAQs section - the answer might be there already!
